OnTab: Your On-Tab Assistant for Definitions and Summaries

Ever wished for a quicker way to get definitions or summaries without switching tabs? OnTab is here to revolutionize your browsing experience. 

Experience GEMINI at your Mouse point.

Simply highlight any text and a popover with "Define" and "Summarize" options will appear. Powered by Gemini, OnTab provides instant information without interrupting your workflow.
